examples.text: Really sabar , really ikhlas but I give up
at you now I'll forever be reminded of sabar itu separuh IKAN-- ; ; ;
Tagline : Sabar itu separuh dari iman

senses.definition: A traditional drum from Senegal, generally played with one hand and one stick
